name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A reminder for Jira Time Tracking

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool to help Jira users to track in time. Any bug may be reported to dmtr.schv@gmail.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When working in Jira environment you sometimes forget to track your working activities. This simple tool is going to help you to control your time tracking routines. There are some useful functionality are going to be added in the nearest future. Enjoy and do not hesitate to report any bug or improvement ideas!
